name: GrantiX
description: GrantiX is an AI-driven Web3 ecosystem that connects real-world social entrepreneurs and crypto investors through a pioneering, purpose-focused fundraising platform powered by blockchain. By implementing unique DeFi and SocialFi tools along with gamified Learn-to-Earn models GrantiX encourages impactful investments and makes social engagement rewarding. GrantiX is the first sustainable, multi-chain impact platform that brings real charities with their donors on-chain, ensuring full transparency to turn funding of good causes into a rewarding, scalable Web3 & Web2 experience. In its AI-driven Web3 ecosystem, GrantiX connects real-world social entrepreneurs and crypto investors through a pioneering purpose-focused fundraising platform empowered by blockchain. By implementing unique DeFi, SocialFi, and gamified Learn-to-Earn models, GrantiX encourages impactful investments and rewards the sponsorship of the good cases. It’s not another “donation-burn” project. Unlike hype-driven Web3 platforms and traditional nonprofits that collapse when government backed funding dries up, GrantiX is revenue-positive by design, it sustains itself through DeFi & CeFi partner integrations for round-up based donations and impact staking – simultaneously providing vested crowdfunding, tokenization advisory and decentralized endowment services for impact-focused social entrepreneurs worldwide.
